sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 所有选手都准备好了比赛。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Suǒyǒu xuǎnshǒu dōu zhǔnbèi hǎo le bǐsài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tous les participants sont prêts pour la compétition.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: All contestants are ready for the competition.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们班级共有四十个学生。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bānjí gòngyǒu sìshí gè xuésheng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre classe compte quarante élèves au total.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our class has a total of forty students.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā kàn shàngqu hěn lèi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a l'air très fatigué.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He looks very tired.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 一方面要工作，一方面要学习。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yī fāngmiàn yào gōngzuò, yī fāngmiàn yào xuéxí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: D'un côté il faut travailler, de l'autre il faut étudier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: On one hand you need to work, on the other hand you need to study.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège píngguǒ yǐjīng chéngshú le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette pomme est déjà mûre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This apple is already ripe.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有自己的长处。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de chángchù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chacun a ses propres points forts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has their own strengths.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hòunián wǒ dǎsuàn qù liúxué.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'année après la prochaine, j'ai l'intention d'aller étudier à l'étranger.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The year after next, I plan to study abroad.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì chéngshì de shāngyè qū.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est le quartier commercial de la ville.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is the commercial district of the city.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuòwán gōngkè cái néng chūqù wán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu ne peux sortir jouer qu'après avoir fini tes devoirs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You can only go out to play after finishing your homework.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Quánchǎng guānzhòng dōu zhàn le qǐlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tous les spectateurs se sont levés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The entire audience stood up.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个视频是我自己制作的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège shìpín shì wǒ zìjǐ zhìzuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette vidéo a été réalisée par moi-même.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This video was made by myself.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiǎoshíhou zhù zài xiāngxia.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il habitait à la campagne quand il était petit.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He lived in the countryside when he was young.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 不要在背后说别人的坏话。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào zài bèihòu shuō biérén de huàihuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne parle pas mal des autres dans leur dos.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't talk badly about others behind their backs.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 在这些书当中，我最喜欢这本。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zài zhèxiē shū dāngzhōng, wǒ zuì xǐhuan zhè běn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Parmi ces livres, celui-ci est mon préféré.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Among these books, I like this one the most.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè bù diànshìjù hěn shòu huānyíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette série télévisée est très populaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This TV series is very popular.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Guóqìngjié yǒu qī tiān jiàqī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La fête nationale compte sept jours de vacances.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: National Day has a seven-day holiday.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè dào cài quē diǎn yán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce plat manque un peu de sel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This dish is lacking some salt.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài diànshìtái gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille à la station de télévision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works at the TV station.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàtiān wǒ xǐhuan chuān duǎnkù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En été, j'aime porter des shorts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In summer, I like to wear shorts.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tīngzhòngmen rèliè gǔzhǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le public a applaudi chaleureusement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The audience applauded warmly.
